WhatsappLinkComp.tagline: Generate WhatsApp click to chat QR code/Widget/Link
WhatsappLinkComp.heading: Simple tool to create WhatsApp click to chat QR code/Widget/Link for your website or landing pages.

steps.heading: 3 steps to creating a QR code/Widget/Link

cards.title: Step 1
cards.description: Enter your country code and your WhatsApp Business number, and add a welcome message if desired.

cards.title: Step 2
cards.description: Personalize your widget, QR code, or link to align with your brand's visual guidelines and identity.

cards.title: Step 3
cards.description: Lastly, simply click the 'Generate Now' button to create your widget, QR code, or link. It's that simple!

create.heading: Create whatsapp Link / Widget/ QR Code

content.title: Type your WhatsApp Number
content.description: Enter your WhatsApp number along with your country code (without the ‘+’ symbol). For instance, if your country code is +91 and your WhatsApp number is 872849182, just type 91872849182.

feilds.name: WhatsApp number
feilds.description: Automatically send this text when a user clicks on your chat link, making it easier to start a conversation.

feilds.name: Pre-Filled Message(optional)
feilds.placeholder: Please enter a valid email address for shipping updates.

feilds.name: Welcome text
feilds.placeholder:
Hi there!
How can I help you?

faqs.question: How does a WhatsApp link work??
faqs.answer: WhatsApp links use a specific URL format that, when clicked, opens the WhatsApp app on a user's device and starts a chat with the provided phone number or message.

faqs.question: Is it possible to create a whatsapp link with predefined message?
faqs.answer: Yes, absolutely. When utilizing the whatsapp API , you can include a pre-filled message along with the phone number in the link. Services like MSG91 offer WhatsApp link generators that allow you to easily create these links.

faqs.question: Is it possible to generate a WhatsApp link for a business account?
faqs.answer: Yes, WhatsApp link generators can create links for both personal and business accounts. Business accounts often have additional features suitable for customer interactions.

faqs.question: Are WhatsApp links cross-platform compatible?
faqs.answer: Yes, WhatsApp links work across different platforms, including iOS, Android, and web browsers, ensuring a seamless experience for users regardless of their device.

faqs.question: How can I generate a Wa link?
faqs.answer: You can generate a WhatsApp link by appending the phone number to the WhatsApp URL: https://wa.me/phonenumbers. For example, to create a link for the number 1234567890, the URL would be https://wa.me/1234567
